attributes.action: vote no confidence in bath and north east somerset council
attributes.additional_details:
Pass a Vote of No Confidence and request a Government Review into BANES COUNCIL

Issues for review :-

Planning permissions passed in Green Field Sites / Hazardous Waste / Street cleaning waste.
Retraction of conditions by highway dept in planning applications.

Failure to comply to Core Strategy

Failure to follow correct consultation processes.

Failure to manage budgets, ie Roman Baths, etc

PLEASE ADD OTHER EXAMPLES
